sentences.en: At the reception they served smoked salmon.
sentences.cn: 招待会的餐桌上有熏制鲑鱼。

sentences.en: Bake salmon in foil or poach in a light stock for 8-10 minutes.
sentences.cn: 用箔纸包烤或用清汤蒸煮三文鱼8至10分钟。

sentences.en: Cut the salmon into long strips and wrap it round the circumference of the bread.
sentences.cn: 把鲑鱼切成长条，缠裹在面包上。

sentences.en: Fresh salmon is a bargain at the supermarket this week.
sentences.cn: 这周超市的新鲜鲑鱼特价销售。

sentences.en: He caught a 6.28-pound salmon in the annual fishing derby at Lake Winnipesaukee.
sentences.cn: 他在温尼珀索基湖举行的一年一度的钓鱼比赛中钓到了一条重6.28磅的鲑鱼。

sentences.en: He gave them a splendid lunch of smoked salmon.
sentences.cn: 他款待了他们一顿极好的熏三文鱼午餐。

sentences.en: Place the salmon in a nonstick metallic dish.
sentences.cn: 将鲑鱼放在不粘底的金属盘内。
熏大马哈鱼——馐馔之福啊!

sentences.en: Smoked salmon was considered an expensive delicacy.
sentences.cn: 熏鲑鱼被认为是一道昂贵的珍馐。

sentences.en: State authorities have ordered cutbacks in deliveries of water from the delta because of the threat to endangered species of salmon and smelt.
sentences.cn: 由于鲑鱼和胡瓜鱼这些濒危物种受到威胁，国家当局已经要求消减从该三角洲往外输水的量。

sentences.en: The city has textile mills and fruit and salmon canneries.
sentences.cn: 这座城市有纺织厂和水果及鲑鱼罐头厂.

sentences.en: The main course was to be a whole poached salmon.
sentences.cn: 主菜将是一整条清炖鲑鱼。

sentences.en: The salmon was alive and kicking when it was dragged out of the river.
sentences.cn: 那条鲑鱼从河里拖出来时还活蹦乱跳呢.

sentences.en: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.cn: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

sentences.en: They dined off salmon, quail, and fruit.
sentences.cn: 他们正餐吃的是鲑鱼、鹌鹑肉和水果。

sentences.en: We saw a salmon jumping in the waterfall there.
sentences.cn: 我们看见一条大马哈鱼在那边瀑布中跳跃.
野生和人工养殖的鲑鱼

words.tran_cn: 鲑鱼；[鱼]大马哈鱼；鲑肉色

phrases.tran_cn: [生]太平洋鲑鱼；大鳞大麻哈鱼；大麻哈鱼属（等于Oncorhynchus）

trans.tran_cn: 鲑鱼，鲑鱼肉，大马哈鱼，三文鱼，橙红色
trans.tran_en: a large fish with silver skin and pink flesh that lives in the sea but swims up rivers to lay its eggs
